Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory731.jpg'}
{3: "The honeyed berry cake that you're savoring as you sit by the roaring fireplace warms you from the inside out, making you cozy to the point of feeling a little drowsy."}
{3: "Noticing Rosetta's concerned look, you shake your head to show that you're feeling you're not feeling drowsy because you're tired."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I see... I hated the idea of asking you to come down here, but everyone was just dying to celebrate your birthday with you, Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{2: "And I didn't want to let them down.", 3: '9', 4: "Hey, don't worry. I made the choice of coming, so I'm not complaining.", 5: '9'}
{3: "It's your birthday today, and the Forest Guards said they really wanted to celebrate it when they heard about it from Rosetta."}
{3: 'Not wanting to disappoint them, you came to the Forest Guard settlement with Rosetta to join the birthday celebration.'}
{3: "It's during this celebration that you truly feel the Forest Guards' warmth."}
{3: 'Rosetta stands beside you and, with her mouth open, she seems like she wants to say something, but quickly closes it.'}
{2: 'I think I saw a card game tournament outside just now.', 3: '14', 4: "Hey, what's up?", 5: '16'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'So did I, and I kind of want to give it a go...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But we've got something more important to do here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta looks outside. Following her gaze, you see a lively scene out there, where Constructs and humans are laughing together in this new city blessed with "gifts from heaven."'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "The Forest Guards wouldn't have been where they are now hadn't it been for your help, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'And I just wanted to take this opportunity to thank you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I just did what needed to be done.', 3: '20', 4: 'No, Rosetta. They have themselves and you to thank...', 5: '20'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Well, I just feel like I have to say it, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Please, you have to accept it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Well, if you so insist...', 3: '23', 4: 'Thanks... Say, how do the Forest Guards go about showing their gratitude again?', 5: '24'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Yup, let me show you how it's done. Here, take a seat.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Let me show you how it's done. Take a seat here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she speaks, Rosetta gently cups your face and lifts it slightly, before she slowly lowers herself.'}
{3: "With your foreheads in touch, the two of you can feel each other's warmth."}
{3: 'Your bodies are now a connected bridge, allowing thoughts to be conveyed without language.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Now, this request may sound a little rude, but...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'May I hug you?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Rosetta's voice is barely audible, but you hear every word that comes out of her mouth since the two of you are so close."}
{2: 'Is this you trying to show your gratitude?', 3: '32', 4: 'Of course.', 5: '33'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'No, this is... beyond gratitude...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta kneels down like a knight until the two of you are at eye level.'}
{3: 'All the while, the two of you remain physically connected by the forehead, then by the cheek, then by the upper body.'}
{3: "If touching foreheads is meant as a way to convey one's gratitude to the other person's mind, then a tight hug is meant to express the deep emotions brewing within one."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I've never been very lucky and have had my fair share of unfortunate experiences.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'But in this unlucky life, something very fortunate happened to me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's your birthday today, and it's on very day that you came into this world, and it's also because of today that I got to cross paths with you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Which is why I think...', 4: '1'}
{3: "The chair you're sitting on suddenly makes a weird noise."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Possibly having grown weak with age, one of the chair's legs suddenly snaps..."}
{3: 'In a split second, Rosetta has unfolded her wings to hover in mid-air and wraps her arms around you.'}
{3: "And thanks to it, you didn't fall to the ground, which is the good news."}
{3: "The bad news is that she's wrapped her arms around you so hard that it hurts just about as much as if you'd fallen on the ground."}
{3: 'As you sit on the ground rubbing yourself, Rosetta looks at you, her eyes heavy with guilt.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Sorry, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'What have I done...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Have you ever heard of the law of conservation of luck?', 3: '54'}
{3: 'You cut her short.'}
{2: 'Every step wrong might actually be putting you one step closer to something greater down the road.', 3: '56'}
{2: "Maybe that's what's happening with you, Rosetta.", 3: '57'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "...Or maybe it's just God trying to balance my luck here since I'm already super lucky for having you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'It seems like Rosetta said something. She looks at you with a wry smile when you look her way.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Well, guess I don't feel as sad down when I look at it that way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But I've still got to keep you safe.", 4: '1'}
